data.text:
KLSentral.info Terms and Conditions

KLSentral.info (“KL Sentral Info Centre”) is held and provided by Simon Vision Enterprise.

In the terms and conditions stated here, whenever we use “us”, “we” and “our”, it refers “KL Sentral Info Centre” and “you” and “your” refers to anyone who uses this site “KLSentral.info”.

General

The access and use of this website are subject to the following Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. By using this website, you agree to act according to these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. If you do not conform to the following Terms and Conditions or our Privacy Policy, you are not allowed to access and use this website and you should stop such access and/or use now.

If you violate any of the terms mentioned herein, your right to access and use this website shall be terminated immediately.

We reserve the right to make changes to these Terms of Use from time to time without providing any prior notification. The amended Terms of Use are effective from the date they are announced on this website. As these Terms of Use are amended from time to time, you must check them whenever you visit this website. Your continued access and use of this website shall represent your acceptance of the amended Terms of Use.

Our Service

While the information contained within the site is periodically updated, no guarantee is given that the information provided in this website is correct, complete, and/or up-to-date. The materials contained on this website are provided for general information purposes only and do not constitute legal or other professional advice on any subject matter. KLSentral.info does not accept any responsibility for any loss which may arise from reliance on information contained on this site

Permitted Use

You are solely permissible to access and use this website for personal, non-commercial functions, which means this website shall solely be accessed and used directly by a private individual or by a business to hunt a product or service for that individual or business and on their own behalf. Access to and use of this website aside from for your personal, non-commercial functions is strictly prohibited.

You cannot use this website:

In any unlawful, fraudulent or commercial manner.

To hurt, abuse, embarrass, defame, libel, threaten, intimidate or harass another person or business, or in a manner that invades another person’s privacy or is obscene, offensive, hateful, indecent, inappropriate, objectionable, unacceptable, discriminatory or damaging as determined by us.

To alter or reverse engineer any part of this website.

In a way that interferes with, disrupts or imposes an unreasonable or disproportionately large burden on our communications and technical systems as determined by us.

Using any automatic computer code, process, program, robot, net crawler, spider, data processing, trawling or alternative ‘screen scraping’ computer code, process, program or system.

Intellectual Property Rights

The copyright of the data, content, material or information displayed on this website belongs to us or our licensor. You may only print, copy, transfer or store extracts of content, material or information (Content) displayed on this website for your own personal use if you abide by the following conditions:

It cannot be used for any business or commercial functions without our permission.

You will not use any automatic computer code, process, program or system, robot, net crawler, spider, data processing, trawling or alternative ‘screen scraping’ computer code, process, program.

It cannot be sold out or transferred to any third party

The copy should retain any copyright or alternative property notices contained within the original

Images displayed on this website are protected by copyright and will not be reproduced or taken in any way without the written permission of the various owner(s).

No logos, trademarks or service marks displayed on this website can be written or downloaded, except as a part of the text of which they are already part of.

You should not modify the paper or digital copies of such data, content, material or information. It shall not be excerpted, reproduced, published, used, reformatted and/or displayed on another website without our written permission.

The standing of us and our licensors as authors of such data, content, material or information should be acknowledged at all times.

All intellectual property rights such as patents, logos, net domain names, ethical rights, data, supply codes, software, specifications, know-how, processes and business strategies (in all cases whether or not registered or unregistered and as well as all rights to use for registration) in and about this website (including data, content, material or information displayed on it) are owned by us or our licensors and such rights are reserved.

Except as mentioned elsewhere in these Terms and Conditions, none of the intellectual property rights that belong to us or our licensors in and about this website (including data, content, material or information displayed on it) can be used, copied, modified, published, transmitted, sold, excerpted, reverse designed, reproduced, reformatted or distributed by you without our express written consent.

All rights in KLSentral.info are owned by us.

Upon submission of personal information in order to receive marketing emails, we will send you email offers, content, and news, related to the content of our website and off-site channels like Facebook and blog content.

Exclusions of Liability

We take all efforts to ensure that the information, material and knowledge on the website are correct and to rectify any errors or omissions as soon as practicable when being notified of them. However, we are not accountable if the information, material and knowledge from a third party, on the website is inaccurate or if there are any errors or omissions within the data, material and information.

We do not endorse any material information and data submitted or provided by third parties that is presented on the website and you must bear in mind that such information could also be inaccurate, incomplete or out of date. We will not be held liable for any knowledge, material or data on the website that has been provided by third parties.

We do not provide any warranty that the website or any information on this Website or any third party website is free from viruses or anything which can have a harmful impact on any technology.

We hold no responsibility for losses or damages arising from an inability to access the website and from any use of the website that is beyond our control.

We are not accountable or to blame for any indirect losses or damages suffered or incurred by you or those which were not predictable when you accessed or used this website. This includes any loss of savings you expect to make, loss of business or business opportunity, loss of profit or revenue or for any loss or damage you may suffer or incur in connection with your use of this Website which was not foreseeable by us when you used this Website.

A number of our channels can offer you with access to third party websites who can host reviews concerning a number of the products and services. In some instances you will even be able to access user reviews directly on the website. The views expressed in third party websites do not represent our views and we will not be accountable for the accuracy or content of any such views or expressions.

Third Party Liability

A number of our channels can offer you access to third party websites who can host reviews concerning a number of the products and services. In some instances, you will even be able to access user reviews directly on the website. The views expressed in third party websites do not represent our views and we will not be responsible for the accuracy or content of any such views or expressions. Use of the hyperlinks and access to such linked websites are entirely at your own risk.

Your use of any third party website is regulated by the terms and conditions and privacy policy of that website. Such terms and conditions and privacy policy might totally differ from these Terms and Conditions and our Privacy Policy. It is your responsibility to go through the terms and conditions and privacy policy of relevant third party websites before using that website. We are not responsible for any loss you will suffer or incur resulting or arising from the terms and conditions or the privacy policy of any third party website or for any acts, omissions, errors or defaults of any third party as a result of their terms and conditions and/or privacy policy.

All hyperlinks to other websites are provided as a matter of convenience to you as a user of the website. In some circumstance shall KL Sentral Info Centre could be associated or affiliated with any trade or service marks, logos or insignia that appears on such third party websites.

Complaints Procedure

We aim to provide all our customers with a high level of service and satisfaction but if you wish to complain about any aspect of our service, please contact us by email (support@klsentral.info).

We cannot answer complaints on behalf of a Service Provider or accept responsibility for any such complaints. We recommend that you visit the website of the Service Provider and follow their complaints procedure if you wish to make a complaint against them.

Your Responsibilities

You have to take all necessary precautions to make sure that any data, content, material or information you offer (including User Content as delineated) are free from viruses, spyware, malicious software and anything which can have a contaminating, harmful or damaging impact on any part of this website or the websites of third parties or any other technology

You may complete a registration as part of your use of this website. Your username and password should be kept confidential by you and not be disclosed to, or shared with anyone. If you choose to share these details with anyone, you are responsible for all activities undertaken on this website using your username and password.

You are responsible for your conduct on this website and for your User Content. You guarantee that your User Content does not violate any privacy rights, holding rights (such as copyright, information rights and trademarks) or alternative rights of any third party (including any right of confidentiality).

Furthermore, your User Content should not violate any law. It should not be harmful, fraudulent, threatening, defamatory, embarrassing, distressing, infringing, abusive, inflammatory, daunting, harassing, libelous, stalking, profane, obscene, indecent, inappropriate, hateful, discriminatory or racially, ethnically, sexually or otherwise objectionable.

These Terms and Conditions were last amended on 21st April 2019.
